effect_entries.effect: Teaches Taunt to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Taunt to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Sweet Scent Gen I: Water Gun)

flavor_text_entries.text:
相手を　怒らせる。３ターンの
あいだ　相手は　ダメージを
与える　技しか　だせなくなる。

The target is taunted into a rage
that allows it to use only attack
moves for three turns.

Provoca il nemico inducendolo a usare solo
mosse d’attacco per tre turni.

Ataca al objetivo con un potente ataque
telequinético que le puede bajar la Defensa
Especial.

Das Ziel wird so gereizt, dass es über 3 Runden
hinweg nur Angriffsattacken einsetzt.

Provoque l’ennemi. L’oblige à n’utiliser que des
attaques pendant trois tours.

상대를 화나게 한다.
3턴 동안 상대는 데미지를
주는 기술밖에 쓸 수 없게 된다.

あいてを　おこらせる。３ターンの
あいだ　あいては　ダメージを
あたえる　わざしか　だせなくなる。

The target is taunted into a rage that
allows it to use only attack moves
for three turns.

allows it to use only attack moves
for three turns.

Provoque l’ennemi. L’oblige à n’utiliser
que des attaques pendant 3 tours.

allows it to use only attack moves for

into a rage that
allows it to use
only attack moves.

it can only use
attack moves.
